trans-unit.target: You spy a sapphire glimmer in the nearby waters.<tab>The sapphire glimmer flickers and fades...<tab>You catch another glimpse of the sapphire glimmer!
You sense the movements of an unexpected predator!<tab>The predator seems to have moved on...<tab>The predator has circled back!
A scarlet streak rises from the depths!<tab>The scarlet streak seems to dissipate...<tab>The scarlet streak rises once more!
